summary: This document is a daily log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 9, 2019. It records inmate movements, status changes (e.g., admissions, releases, transfers), and cell assignments. The log includes the name Jeffrey Epstein, who was an inmate at the facility at the time.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on August 9, 2019, with registration number 76309-054.
The document is a standard Bureau of Prisons (BOP) daily facility log tracking inmate movements and status changes.
Epstein was recorded as being moved from location 'm01-001L' to 'E02-511U' on August 9, 2019, at 13:10 (1:10 PM).
The log shows routine prison operations including admissions, releases ('GCT REL', 'FT REL'), bail/bond processing, and cell transfers for multiple inmates.
This document provides a snapshot of Epstein's status and location within the federal prison system approximately one month before his death on August 10, 2019.
